original_text: You became imitators of us and of the Lord, for you welcomed the message in the midst of severe suffering with the joy given by the Holy Spirit.
korean_text: 또 너희는 많은 환난 가운데서 성령의 기쁨으로 말씀을 받아 우리와 주를 본받은 자가 되었으니

sentences.original_text: You became imitators of us and of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 우리와 주님을 본받는 자가 되었으니

sentences.original_text: in the midst of severe suffering
with the joy given by the Holy Spirit
